::Striker::

Striker's eyes narrow as he watches Spears kiss Prebon, anger flaring up at 
him. His side was leaking mechfluid from the attack, but it was nothing his 
internal repairs couldn't handle. He growls as he wathces Spears and Prebon 
walk away, his mind working over what Prebon had said.

He looks up at the camera, frowning. His scanners had completed their scan on 
the chip, all he had to do was get the info to the Maximals. He frowns, 
thinking of Prebon's promise to clear his memory. There was no way he was 
going to forget Spears, not without going to the Matrix and back first.

"Computer," he silently orders his internal systems, "If I go unconscious, 
self destruct, no countdown."

Striker looks back at the door, trying to think of a plan to escape, and save 
Spears as well.
